title: Autonomous Vehicle Developer AUMOVIO to Use AWS Cloud and AI Capabilities
description: AUMOVIO selected Amazon Web Services (AWS) as its preferred cloud provider to help the company accelerate the development of autonomous vehicles. The integration of agentic and generative artificial intelligence capabilities into AUMOVIO’s autonomous development and validation workflows will speed up manufacturers’ development, testing and preparation of autonomous vehicles for real-world deployment, the companies said [...]The post Autonomous Vehicle Developer AUMOVIO to Use AWS Cloud and AI Capabilities appeared first on PYMNTS.com.
